languages.text:
At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this effect is removed from that ally.

traits.locale_text:
At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any damage and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this effect is removed from that ally.

At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this effect is removed from that ally.

At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this effect is removed from that ally.

languages.text:
每场战斗开始时，装备者的所有盟友获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}。
当装备者的盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，损失非临时性{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，该盟友会失去此效果。
languages.original_text:
At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this effect is removed from that ally.

traits.locale_text:
每场战斗开始时，装备者每有1级{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}，装备者的所有盟友便会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。
当装备者的盟友受到攻击，损失非临时性{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，该盟友会失去此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。

每场战斗开始时，装备者的所有盟友获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}。
当装备者的盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，损失非临时性{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，该盟友会失去此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。

languages.text:
В начале каждого боя союзники персонажа получают бонус к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, равный {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтингу{/g} персонажа.
Когда этот союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} или теряет {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, которое не является временным, эффект снимается.
languages.original_text:
At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this effect is removed from that ally.

traits.locale_text:
В начале каждого боя союзники персонажа получают бонус к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, равный {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтингу{/g} персонажа.
Когда этот союзник получает урон или теряет {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, эффект снимается.

В начале каждого боя союзники персонажа получают бонус к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, равный {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтингу{/g} персонажа.
Когда этот союзник получает урон или теряет {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, эффект снимается.

В начале каждого боя союзники персонажа получают бонус к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, равный {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтингу{/g} персонажа.
Когда этот союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} или теряет {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, которое не является временным, эффект снимается.

В начале каждого боя союзники персонажа получают бонус к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, равный {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтингу{/g} персонажа.
Когда этот союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} или теряет {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, которое не является временным, эффект снимается.

languages.text:
戦闘開始時、使用者の味方は、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を獲得する。
味方がいずれかの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受け、一時的なものではない{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力を失うたびに、この効果は味方から取り除かれる。
languages.original_text:
At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this effect is removed from that ally.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘開始時に使用者の味方は、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を1獲得する。
味方がいずれかのダメージを受け、一時的ではない{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を負うと、この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}は味方から取り除かれる。

戦闘開始時に使用者の味方は、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を獲得する。
味方がいずれかの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受け、一時的ではない{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を負うたびに、この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は味方から取り除かれる。

languages.text:
Al principio del combate, los aliados del portador obtienen {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} igual al {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del portador.
Cada vez que un aliado sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y pierde {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} no temporales, el aliado pierde este efecto.
languages.original_text:
At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this effect is removed from that ally.

traits.locale_text:
Al principio del combate, los aliados del portador obtienen +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} igual al {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del portador.
Cada vez que un aliado sufre daño y pierde {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} no temporales, un aliado pierde este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}.

languages.text:
Zu Beginn jedes Kampfes erhalten die Verbündeten des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} in Höhe des {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wertes{/g} des Trägers.
Wenn ein Verbündeter {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet und nicht-temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verliert, wird dieser Effekt vom Verbündeten entfernt.
languages.original_text:
At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this effect is removed from that ally.

traits.locale_text:
Zu Beginn jedes Kampfes erhalten die Verbündeten des Trägers +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} entsprechend des {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wertes{/g} des Trägers.
Immer wenn ein Verbündeter Schaden erleidet und nicht-temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verliert, wird dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} vom Verbündeten entfernt.

languages.text:
Au début de chaque combat, les alliés de l'utilisateur reçoivent une {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} égale à l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de celui-ci.
Chaque fois qu'un allié subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et perd des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} non temporaires, cet effet est retiré à cet allié.
languages.original_text:
At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this effect is removed from that ally.

traits.locale_text:
Au début de chaque combat, les alliés de l'utilisateur reçoivent une valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} égale à l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de celui-ci.
Chaque fois qu'un allié subit des dégâts et perd des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} non temporaires, cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} est retiré à cet allié.

Au début de chaque combat, les alliés de l'utilisateur reçoivent une valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} égale à l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de celui-ci.
Chaque fois qu'un allié subit des dégâts et perd des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} non temporaires, cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} est retiré à cet allié.

languages.text:
Takan kişinin dost birimleri, her çatışma başladığında takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri kazanırlar.
Bir dost birim, herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalırsa ve geçici olmayan {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanlarını kaybederse üzerindeki bu etki ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text:
At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this effect is removed from that ally.
